com.ubuntu.MigrationAssistant.Import

    Methods:
    Commit () -> Merges itself into the merged object that is intended to
                 become its new value, then flushes the merged object to disk
                 in its format.

    Signals:
    Progress(out 'i') -> Emits an integer value for progress complete.
                         We cannot report the object being imported, as
                         multiple import routines could be running in parallel.
